channel.title: CVE Feed for libxls -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for libxls -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-12109|2024-09-16T16:22:32.714Z -- libxls -- libxls
item.description: An exploitable integer overflow vulnerability exists in the xls_preparseWorkSheet function of libxls 1.4 when handling a MULRK record. A specially crafted XLS file can cause a memory corruption resulting in remote code execution. An attacker can send malicious XLS file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-2897|2024-09-16T20:17:24.866Z -- libxls -- libxls
item.description: An exploitable out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the read_MSAT function of libxls 1.4. A specially crafted XLS file can cause a memory corruption resulting in remote code execution. An attacker can send malicious XLS file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-12111|2024-09-16T18:19:15.759Z -- libxls -- libxls
item.description: An exploitable out-of-bounds vulnerability exists in the xls_addCell function of libxls 1.4. A specially crafted XLS file with a formula record can cause memory corruption resulting in remote code execution. An attacker can send a malicious XLS file to trigger this vulnerability.
